content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (60.0, -60.0)) and a burner inserter (position (60.5, -61.5))

### Copper cable factory
No entities found related to copper cable factory

### Boiler system at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) and pipe connections to offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) and steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5))

### Offshore pump system at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) and pipe connections to boiler (position (111.5, -32.0))

### Belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts (positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)) with direction UP

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has a valid fuel source
- Ensure the burner inserter has a valid pickup and drop position

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump has a valid connection to the pipe system
- Ensure the offshore pump has a valid fluid box

### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure the boiler has a valid fuel source
- Ensure the boiler has a valid connection to the pipe system

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid input liquid
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid connection to the pipe system

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
